name: Static Stretching
description: Static stretching exercises to improve flexibility and mobility.

workout_groups.name: Beginner Static Stretching
workout_groups.description: Basic static stretches to improve flexibility and mobility, ideal for beginners.

workouts.name: Standing Hamstring Stretch
workouts.description: Bend at the hips and reach toward your toes while keeping your legs straight.

workouts.name: Seated Forward Fold
workouts.description: Sit with your legs extended and reach forward while keeping your back straight.

workouts.name: Quadriceps Stretch
workouts.description: Stand on one leg, pull the opposite ankle toward your glutes, and hold the stretch.

workouts.name: Chest Stretch Against Wall
workouts.description: Place your hand against a wall and slowly turn your body away to stretch the chest.

workouts.name: Neck Side Stretch
workouts.description: Tilt your head to one side, bringing your ear toward your shoulder to stretch the neck.

workouts.name: Childâ€™s Pose Stretch
workouts.description: Sit back on your heels and extend your arms forward, keeping your back straight.

workouts.name: Calf Stretch Against Wall
workouts.description: Press your foot against a wall while keeping your heel down to stretch the calf muscles.

workout_groups.name: Advanced Static Stretching
workout_groups.description: Deeper and more intense static stretches to improve flexibility and mobility.

workouts.name: Standing Wide-Leg Forward Fold
workouts.description: Stand with legs wide and fold forward, bringing hands to the ground.

workouts.name: Lying Glute Stretch
workouts.description: Lie on your back, cross one ankle over the opposite knee, and pull the knee toward your chest.

workouts.name: Deep Lunge Hip Flexor Stretch
workouts.description: Sink into a deep lunge position, keeping your back leg extended for a hip flexor stretch.

workouts.name: Butterfly Stretch
workouts.description: Sit with your feet together and gently push your knees toward the floor.

workouts.name: Seated Side Stretch
workouts.description: Sit with legs extended and reach one arm over your head, stretching to the side.

workouts.name: Wall Chest & Shoulder Stretch
workouts.description: Stand facing a wall, place your hand against it, and turn your torso away to stretch the shoulder and chest.

workouts.name: Seated Frog Stretch
workouts.description: Sit with knees bent outward, pressing feet together, and lean forward to stretch the groin.

workout_groups.name: Super Static Stretching
workout_groups.description: Elite static stretching for extreme flexibility, muscle elongation, and deep mobility work.

workouts.name: Full Pancake Stretch
workouts.description: Sit with legs spread wide and fold forward, trying to bring your chest to the floor.

workouts.name: Wall Split Stretch
workouts.description: Lie with one leg against the wall in a vertical split position, holding for deep flexibility gains.

workouts.name: Extreme Hip Opener Stretch
workouts.description: Sink into a deep squat, press knees outward, and hold while keeping the chest upright.

workouts.name: Overhead Shoulder Stretch
workouts.description: Hold a pole or towel overhead and stretch the shoulders backward into deep extension.

workouts.name: Front Split Hold
workouts.description: Slowly lower into a full front split position and hold with proper alignment.

workouts.name: Full Cobra Stretch
workouts.description: Lie face down and push your chest up into a deep backbend, engaging spinal mobility.

workouts.name: Elevated Pigeon Pose
workouts.description: Place your front leg on an elevated surface and lean forward to deepen the stretch.
